title: Flask.auto_find_instance_path() can return wrong path for namespace packages installed in development mode
raw_output: Issue 4602 reports that Flask.auto_find_instance_path() returns the wrong path for namespace packages. The auto_find_instance_path method is in scaffold.py. Predicted files: (1) src/flask/scaffold.py - contains auto_find_instance_path() method. (2) CHANGES.rst - changelog entry for the bug fix. (3) tests/test_basic.py - basic app tests that cover instance path resolution. Exploration: Matched src/flask/scaffold.py -> tests/test_basic.py (scaffold functionality is tested in basic tests).
